object.name: createForumTopic
object.description: Use this method to create a topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_manage_topics administrator right. Returns information about the created topic as a ForumTopic object.
object.html_description: Use this method to create a topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_manage_topics administrator right. Returns information about the created topic as a ForumTopic object.
object.rst_description: Use this method to create a topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the *can_manage_topics* administrator right. Returns information about the created topic as a :class:`aiogram.types.forum_topic.ForumTopic` object.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format. Currently, must be one of 7322096 (0x6FB9F0), 16766590 (0xFFD67E), 13338331 (0xCB86DB), 9367192 (0x8EEE98), 16749490 (0xFF93B2), or 16478047 (0xFB6F5F)
annotations.html_description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format. Currently, must be one of 7322096 (0x6FB9F0), 16766590 (0xFFD67E), 13338331 (0xCB86DB), 9367192 (0x8EEE98), 16749490 (0xFF93B2), or 16478047 (0xFB6F5F)
annotations.rst_description: Color of the topic icon in RGB format. Currently, must be one of 7322096 (0x6FB9F0), 16766590 (0xFFD67E), 13338331 (0xCB86DB), 9367192 (0x8EEE98), 16749490 (0xFF93B2), or 16478047 (0xFB6F5F)
annotations.name: icon_color

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use getForumTopicIconStickers to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use getForumTopicIconStickers to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the custom emoji shown as the topic icon. Use :class:`aiogram.methods.get_forum_topic_icon_stickers.GetForumTopicIconStickers` to get all allowed custom emoji identifiers.
annotations.name: icon_custom_emoji_id
